author: Nintendo of America
description:
Play Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted, now on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/plants-vs-zombies-replanted-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01 

The iconic backyard battles you remember, made better than ever! 

Welcome to Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted, the lovingly rebuilt edition of the PopCap classic that started it all. With refreshed visuals, improved performance, and updated features, Replanted delivers the definitive way to experience this timeless strategy favorite. 

Whether you're planting powerful Peashooters or bracing for Dr. Zomboss’ latest schemes, Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted brings the charm, humor, and tactical fun to a whole new generation. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #PlantsvsZombies 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/Nintendo
title: Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted – Accolades Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
